news_header: President Stu has discussed North Korean soldiers in Ukraine with China's leader and plans to visit China, focusing on economic relations and cooperation agreements.
news_text: President Alexander Stu has engaged in talks with Chinese President Xi Jinping regarding North Korean soldiers in Ukraine, climate issues, and international relations. He announced his upcoming visit to China, emphasizing the importance of China's sovereignty and its role as a superpower. During his trip, significant trade relations were established, particularly in the field of raw materials. Finnish Minister of Agriculture and Forestry Sari Essayah highlighted new cooperation agreements with China, allowing Finnish companies to export chicken after seven years of negotiations.
